name: Cadaverdasher
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse/Touch: Move towards selected tile
  • Keyboard: Number pad or vi keys to move
  • 'Bump' graves to dig for 'bones' and 'flesh'
  • Create undead with the button when active
  • Toggle "Sneak" to On/Off to hide/show yourself

Goals:

  • Dig up graves - but this will attract nearby guards
  • Collect mostly bones from graves
  • Collect mostly flesh from guards and civilians
  • Craft Undead
  • Undead can attack civilians
  • Undead can attack the guards
  • Overwhelm the guards
